user.description:
To find your API key, open the Tautulli webpage and navigate to Settings and then to Web interface. The API key will be at the bottom of that page.

Example of the URL: ```http://192.168.0.10:8181``` with 8181 being the default port.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Tautulli
reauth_confirm.description: To find your API key, open the Tautulli webpage and navigate to Settings and then to Web interface. The API key will be at the bottom of that page.
